public class GlobalManager extends Object

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addClientSessionToGlobalManager(ClientSession clientSession)
    adds a newly created client session to those that are tracked, realizing a pool of active user sessions
    void
    addNewGame(String gameID, GameController gameController)
    adds a new game to the map that contains all game, within global manager
    void
    addPlayerToGame(String gameID, ClientSession clientSession)
    adds a player (more specifically, their client session) to a game
    void
    addRequestToGlobalQueue(UserRequest newRequest)
    adds a request to the global manager's linked blocking list, so that it will be processed as soon as the processing thread is free
    boolean
    checkIfAuthenticated(String sessionID)
    checks if the requested client session has already logged in using username and password

    creates a new game by creating an instance of a game controller, and adds it to those contained in game controller

    dispatchGlobalRequest(UserRequest requestToProcess)
    effectively dispatches the next global request in the queue to the appropriate routine for that type of request

    fetchAvailableGamesInformation()
    fetches the main information of all games in the server that haven't been closed yet.

    formats information of a given game for display

    returns the ClientSession object (which represents an active user session) that corresponds to the requested client session ID

    the default routine for initializing a session for a client that is implementing RMI for communication

    checks if the client session corresponding to the requested username already logged in using username and password

  • Constructor Details

    • GlobalManager

      public GlobalManager()

  • Method Details

    • addRequestToGlobalQueue

      public void addRequestToGlobalQueue(UserRequest newRequest)
      adds a request to the global manager's linked blocking list, so that it will be processed as soon as the processing thread is free
      Parameters:
      newRequest - is the request to be added

    • startProcessingRequests

      public void startProcessingRequests()
      starts a separate thread for processing and dispatching requests in global manager

    • dispatchGlobalRequest

      public void dispatchGlobalRequest(UserRequest requestToProcess)
      effectively dispatches the next global request in the queue to the appropriate routine for that type of request
      Parameters:
      requestToProcess -

    • initializeClientSession

      public void initializeClientSession(Socket clientSocket)
      the default routine for initializing a session for a client that is implementing socket for communication note: there's no need to return the client session
      Parameters:
      clientSocket - is the client's socket

    • initializeClientSession

      public ClientSession initializeClientSession(RMIRemoteClient clientStub) throws RemoteException
      the default routine for initializing a session for a client that is implementing RMI for communication
      Parameters:
      clientStub - is the client's stub
      Returns:
      the client session
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • addClientSessionToGlobalManager

      public void addClientSessionToGlobalManager(ClientSession clientSession)
      adds a newly created client session to those that are tracked, realizing a pool of active user sessions
      Parameters:
      clientSession - is the client session to add

    • getClientSession

      public ClientSession getClientSession(String clientSessionID)
      returns the ClientSession object (which represents an active user session) that corresponds to the requested client session ID
      Parameters:
      clientSessionID - is the requested client session ID that the ClientSession object returned must match
      Returns:
      the requested ClientSession object

    • removeClientSession

      public void removeClientSession(String clientSessionID)
      removes the client session from the active user sessions
      Parameters:
      clientSessionID - is the ID that the client session to remove has to match

    • checkIfAuthenticated

      public boolean checkIfAuthenticated(String sessionID)
      checks if the requested client session has already logged in using username and password
      Parameters:
      sessionID - is the ID of the requested client session
      Returns:
      true if already authenticated, false otherwise

    • isUserAlreadyAuthenticated

      public boolean isUserAlreadyAuthenticated(String username)
      checks if the client session corresponding to the requested username already logged in using username and password
      Parameters:
      username - is the username whose authentication status is to be checked
      Returns:
      true if already authenticated, false otherwise

    • removeAuthenticatedUser

      public void removeAuthenticatedUser(String username)
      removes the entry in the map tracking authenticated users
      Parameters:
      username - is the username to be removed

    • getClientSessionFromUsername

      public ClientSession getClientSessionFromUsername(String username)
      gets the client session ID associated to a username that already logged in
      Parameters:
      username - is the requested username
      Returns:
      the client session ID

    • register

      public void register(String clientSessionID, String username, String passwordHash)
      realizes all the steps required to register a player, including checks
      Parameters:
      clientSessionID - is the client session ID of the client that is attempting registration
      username - is the username provided by the client
      passwordHash - is the hash of the password provided by the client

    • login

      public void login(String clientSessionID, String username, String passwordHash)
      realizes all the steps required to log a player into the server, including checks
      Parameters:
      clientSessionID - is the client session ID of the client that is attempting to log in
      username - is the username provided by the client
      passwordHash - is the hash of the password provided by the client

    • logout

      public void logout(String clientSessionID)
      logs out the client. that is, their username is removed from the authenticated users and changes the status of the client to prior to authentication
      Parameters:
      clientSessionID -

    • createNewGame

      public String createNewGame(FlightType flightType, int numberOfPlayers)
      creates a new game by creating an instance of a game controller, and adds it to those contained in game controller
      Parameters:
      flightType - specifies the type of flight (trial, or level two)
      numberOfPlayers - specifies the number of players for the game to start
      Returns:
      returns the ID of the newly created game

    • getGame

      public GameController getGame(String gameID)
      gets a game from the game ID provided
      Parameters:
      gameID - is the requested game's ID
      Returns:
      the game controller of the requested game

    • addNewGame

      public void addNewGame(String gameID, GameController gameController)
      adds a new game to the map that contains all game, within global manager
      Parameters:
      gameID - is the game's ID
      gameController - is the game's controller

    • removeGame

      public void removeGame(String gameID)
      removes the game controller from those contained in global manager
      Parameters:
      gameID - is the ID of the game to be removed

    • addPlayerToGame

      public void addPlayerToGame(String gameID, ClientSession clientSession)
      adds a player (more specifically, their client session) to a game
      Parameters:
      gameID - is the ID of the requested game
      clientSession - is the client session of the player to add

    • getRunningGameForPlayer

      public String getRunningGameForPlayer(String username)
      if a given player is in-game and the game is in running state, the method returns the ID of said game
      Parameters:
      username - is the username of the player
      Returns:
      the ID of the game

    • fetchAvailableGamesInformation

      public String fetchAvailableGamesInformation()
      fetches the main information of all games in the server that haven't been closed yet. it's a visualization of the lobby of all games this includes both games that haven't started yet, but also games that are already running
      Returns:
      a string containing information gathered, which will be sent to players

    • formatGameInformation

      public String formatGameInformation(GameController game)
      formats information of a given game for display
      Parameters:
      game - is the game whose information to format
      Returns:
      game information (as a string)

    • updatePlayersInGlobalLobbyOnAvailableGames

      public void updatePlayersInGlobalLobbyOnAvailableGames()
      sends available games information to authenticated players that are not in game

    • updatePlayerOnAvailableGames

      public void updatePlayerOnAvailableGames(String username)
      sends available games information to a specific (authenticated) player
      Parameters:
      username - is the username of the player

    • onDisconnect

      public void onDisconnect(String clientSessionID)
      executes complete routine for global manager to account for the disconnection of a client, regardless of whether they were authenticated or not
      Parameters:
      clientSessionID - is the session ID of the client that has disconnected

    • saveGamesOnDisk

      public void saveGamesOnDisk()
      saveGamesOnDisk() is useful to save all the ongoing games on the server's local memory

    • loadGamesFromDisk

      public void loadGamesFromDisk()
      loadGamesFromDisk() is useful to load ongoing games from server's local memory
